t: Amazon Brand Detector Extension: Find Out How Many Brands Amazon Owns
s: May 21, 2024 - Amazon owns a lot of private label brands. This number is always growing as the company acquires new brands and launches new ones. You can use the extension called Amazon Brand Detector to determine how many brands Amazon owns.
